['', 'Stephen Scheeler | CEO & Managing Director', 'Provide market intelligence into product development, including market opportunities, trends, and customer feedback ', 'Support our customers in the clinical and research implementations of our initial product launch in the field of connectomicsTrain clinicians in the clinical and practical applications of connectomics through a combination of onsite and webinar formatsFacilitate onsite clinical training and initial clinical use of connectomics software across surgery, neurology, radiology, and psychiatry as requiredSupport in sales efforts by participating in pre-sales activities with the sales team and marketing initiatives with the marketing team Provide 1st level MRI and IT support for our software Support the business development teams in launching and supporting strategic clinical research initiativesProvide market intelligence into product development, including market opportunities, trends, and customer feedback 50%+ travel required across the US and Canada', 'Support in sales efforts by participating in pre-sales activities with the sales team and marketing initiatives with the marketing team ', 'PRODUCT', 'Train clinicians in the clinical and practical applications of connectomics through a combination of onsite and webinar formats', 'Prior experience with brain imaging, neuroanatomy, neurology, or neurosurgery is preferred', 'The position will require development of both a high level of clinical expertise in the new field of connectomics and technical expertise in MRI and Hospital IT to facilitate new site deployment. There will be travel to customer sites and support in the point of use of the software in the hospital setting, including but not limited to radiological imaging in MRI, neurological testing in clinic, and surgical intervention in the operating room. ', 'Connectomics,', 'Mike built one of the biggest neurosurgery practices in the US.\xa0With over 230 articles published in scientific journals and as a world authority in the field of Connectomics, Mike brings an unrivalled understanding of the brain to the business of practical clinical outcomes.', 'Master’s degree is desired in a technical or clinical field, Bachelor’s degree is required', 'Omniscient seeks an experienced and qualified Connectomics Applications Specialist – US to drive clinical and research success with our customers. ', 'To enable the world’s doctors to treat the brain health of billions through personalised clinical decision support software', 'RESPONSIBILITIES', 'Must be able to travel throughout the US and Canada, sometimes with short notice ', 'Facilitate onsite clinical training and initial clinical use of connectomics software across surgery, neurology, radiology, and psychiatry as required', '50%+ travel required across the US and Canada', 'Self-starter able to work independently with little or no supervision', 'Experience interacting with MRI and hospital IT is preferred', 'Dr Michael Sughrue | ', 'As a key member of a cutting-edge machine learning driven tech start-up, we are looking for an individual who will own the concepts and become expert in this new space and contribute creative strategic ideas back into our business and technical teams. \xa0', 'We are looking for a clinically savvy, highly dynamic individual to join our team and help crack open the North American market. The ideal individual would be highly motivated by working with global thought-leaders in the field of connectomics to become a clinical applications expert, and using that expertise to drive clinical success with new and potential customers. Our products are different than what is out there today; some experience in machine learning or advanced medical imaging would be a plus, but most important is a desire and aptitude to become an expert in the space. ', 'The ideal candidate would have the communication and interpersonal skills to be able to command a room of highly educated clinicians and researchers', 'Support the business development teams in launching and supporting strategic clinical research initiatives', 'Remuneration would be based on market and candidate experience. The role involves a very attractive Employee Share Option Plan.', 'VISION', 'This is a fully remote position reporting to Brad Fernald, VP North America.', 'Strong interpersonal and presentation skills, along with the ability to communicate effectively with customers and others at all levels of the organization', 'Co-Founder, Director & Chief Medical Officer', 'Support our customers in the clinical and research implementations of our initial product launch in the field of connectomics', 'Prior experience supporting the clinical use of a highly technical medical product or in supporting similar research efforts ', 'Clinical decision support software that takes a rsfMRI brain image, loaded via a web browser that de-identifies on-site, to the Cloud where, through 23 machine-learning steps, we return a functional map and detect anomalies of the patient’s brain in one hour.\xa0This allows neurosurgeons, neurologists, psychologists and psychiatrists to make more accurate diagnosis and personalised treatment plans for all brain-related disorders.', 'Dr Stephane Doyen | Co-Founder, Director & Chief Technology Officer', 'As the Head Data Scientist with top-tier consultants, Oliver Wyman, combined with a PhD in neuroscience from Cambridge, Stephane is the ideal technical leader to develop our brain/machine-learning software.', 'SENIOR TEAM', 'CEO & Managing Director', 'Provide 1st level MRI and IT support for our software ', 'Dr Michael Sughrue | Co-Founder, Director & Chief Medical Officer', 'Co-Founder, Director & Chief Technology Officer', 'KEY REQUIREMENTS', 'Stephen ['', 'Please see the complete post and online application information here:', 'The successful applicant will collaborate with faculty across the state to develop curricula and training in bioinformatics skills with college and university science instructors so that they can effectively integrate bioinformatics into their science curricula and help their students prepare for the 21st century workplace, and these activities will constitute the service component of the positions.', 'The Core serves a state-wide network that includes the University of Wyoming (Laramie and Casper), as well as several community colleges, so some travel within the state is associated with the position.', 'The research component is anticipated to mostly consist of co-authored publications arising from these collaborative projects. However, as long as the service goals of the positions are achieved, maintenance of an independent research program will be encouraged.', 'The teaching component will consist of organizing and conducting formal training activities (short courses, workshops), as well as one-on-one training sessions with researchers.', 'http://www.uwyo.edu/wyominginbre', 'JOB TITLE:\xa0Education/Outreach Coordinator - Research Scientist in Bioinformatics', 'RESEARCH SCIENTIST IN BIOINFORMATICS Department: The NIH-funded grant Wyoming INBRE Bioinformatics Core is seeking to hire a Research Scientist. The position will support the bioinformatics research and education activities of the Core, and will include service (60%), teaching (30%), and research (10%) components.\xa0', 'Education/Outreach Coordinator - - Research Scientist in Bioinformatics - (20002838)', 'The Wyoming INBRE Bioinformatics (IBC) is seeking to expand its team with the hire of a data scientist experienced in working with biological data. Our team currently consists of scientists\xa0whose expertise covers model system genetics, bacterial evolution, marine biology, forest population genomics and computational biology.', 'ESSENTIAL DUTIES AND RESPONSIBILITIES:', 'https://uwyo.taleo.net/careersection/00_ex/jobdetail.ftl?job=20002838&lang=en', 'Additional information about the WY INBRE program can be viewed here:\xa0', 'Additional information about the IBC can be found here:', '\xa0https://ibc.uwyo.online', 'The University of Wyoming invites diverse applicants to consider our employment opportunities.\xa0We are also especially interested in candidates who have experience working with diverse populations and/or diverse initiatives.']

['RGP is a global consulting firm helping some of the most recognized companies in the world work differently. responsible for the overall fraud and abuse protection product strategy. The focus of the team is to define the product requirements, research the best way to defend against the threat vectors and architect the product to meet the following key requirements: Detection: Detect automated and human fraud / abuse through various methods with high accuracy. The detection must be tightly integrated with the challenge framework so as to adopt the most effective response strategy depending on the risk associated with the request session. The challenge framework is managed by Matt Ford’s Product Challenge organization. Visibility: provide a set of dashboard and reports to customers, partner and our support team to allow them to visualize and analyze the fraud activity detected by the product Serviceability: provide customers the ability tune the detection and response strategy based on the risk score. Also provide customers the ability to craft custom logic to meet their own requirements. The product platform consists of technical product managers and the product research team. The product research team is responsible for coming up with different ways to process data collected on a session in order to differentiate bot from human traffic but also detect human fraud within the human traffic. The team may use different techniques including but not limited to statistical model, unsupervised learning, supervised learning, deep learning, whichever model is the most effective to meet the accuracy requirements.', 'Responsibilities:']

['', 'QAOA, Quantum Approximate Optimization Algorithm, Variational Quantum Eigensolver, VQE Algorithm', 'We are currently seeking a Quantum Algorithms Researcher (Quantum Computing, Software, Python) to join a Bay Area startup ($15 million Series A) whose vision is to break through the global market with their unique, patented quantum computing software. As a Quantum Algorithms Researcher in our company, you will work alongside our world-renowned team of Quantum Algorithms experts hailing from top universities (MIT, Stanford, University of Oxford) helping develop and optimize quantum algorithms for the acceleration of state-of-the-art NISQ hardware.', "Key Skills: Quantum Computing, Quantum Algorithms, Machine Learning, Research, Shor's Algorithm, Grover's Algorithm, Quantum Computation, Quantum Information, Quantum Entanglement, Quantum Superposition, QAOA, Quantum Approximate Optimization Algorithm, Variational Quantum Eigensolver, VQE Algorithm", 'An ideal Quantum Algorithm Researcher will have experience developing and publishing work on quantum algorithms, as well as familiarity with machine/deep learning.', 'Quantum Algorithms Researcher (Quantum Computing, Software, Python)', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Competitive salaries, equity and benefits packages', 'As a VC-funded startup in the Bay Area, we are keen on bringing in exceptional researchers and developers to aid in developing novel algorithms for cutting-edge quantum computing hardware to be made easily accessible by not only quantum computing experts, but any classically-trained developer or data scientist using any process including binary optimization, machine learning, chemistry simulation, and more.', 'We can offer a\xa0Quantum Algorithms Researcher:', "Key Skills: Quantum Computing, Quantum Algorithms, Machine Learning, Research, Shor's Algorithm, Grover's Algorithm, Quantum Computation, Quantum Information, Quantum Entanglement, Quantum Superposition,", '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0A chance to develop novel quantum algorithms alongside world-renowned quantum algorithms experts', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Intellectual challenges that you would not experience in most companies.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0A collaborative team and culture that truly looks after talent and cultivates success', '\xa0']

We are seeking an experienced, driven Senior Account Executive to help us hit our sales and growth goals in 2021 and beyond.', 'Employees joining the Syndio team at this early stage of growth will impact this critical social issue and support a growing customer base to take tangible action on workplace fairness.\xa0', 'Within 3 months, the training wheels come off and you’ll be selling into enterprise accounts.', 'Role progression', 'About the role\xa0', 'You have more than 5 years experience in sales—ideally, 7-10 years.', 'Operate with the mentality that sales is a team sport, and bring in Syndio SMEs—e.g. lawyer, labor economist, data scientist, testifying expert, CEO—to close deals.', 'You’re attracted to the challenge of a startup environment and can adapt to—and thrive—amidst change.\xa0', 'Expertise at the Transactional & Enterprise Level', 'You are proficient with spreadsheets, presentation, and project management business applications, and have a working knowledge of Salesforce.com and LinkedIn Sales Navigator.', 'About you', 'At Syndio, you’ll receive a competitive salary, bonuses, equity, and a lot more benefits! As part of our commitment to fair pay, we’ll never ask your salary history. We’ll share the salary range for this position with you during our first conversation.\xa0', 'Provide product demonstrations and general support to prospective customers.', 'Develop and manage the sales pipeline, and simultaneously move a large number of transactions through the sales pipeline.', 'If you’re interested in joining the Syndio team, apply using the link below. Salesforce.com and LinkedIn Sales Navigator.', 'We are looking for someone who’s a believer in equal pay for equal work, who wants to propel their sales career to the next level, and who’s willing to take a leap to prove it. In this role, you will drive direct and channel sales of our growing suite of products to senior-level contacts (e.g. Heads of Compensation, CHROs, Legal, CDOs) at the best-known brands around the world. By joining at this early stage, you’ll have a stake in shaping the future of the company and play a critical role as we head into 2021 with a new suite of products, continued support from a fantastic leadership team and board, and big ambition.', 'You’re curious, a great listener who knows where to poke and prod with prospects to inspire them to take action and drive organizational change.', 'You bring a positive attitude, hustle, and persistence to your role.', 'You are committed to our mission of pay equity and passionate about Syndio products.\xa0', 'Consistent overachievement of sales goals in a large geographic territory', 'Build a savvy sales team and propel their success.', 'How often do you have the chance to step into a sales role where you can directly influence the growth of the company? ['', 'Qualifications:', 'Bonus if you have experience for leading /managing teams/projects ', 'You will be responsible for leading design & development of Product Catalog & Search components including storage, search, large data processing (stream & batch), APIs, analytics, tools and web services. ', '7+ years of solid Java back-end experience Strong knowledge of design patterns, OOPS principles and data structures Strong knowledge of at least some of the following frameworks/technologies –, Spring, REST, XML, JSON, ActiveMQ, Kafka Experience with any of these technologies a HUGE plus: Big Data (Cassandra / Hadoop), Spark, Flink, machine learning, Cloud (AWS or Google Cloud) Bonus if you have experience for leading /managing teams/projects Experience with tools and technologies like Gradle, Maven, Jenkins, git, IntelliJ, Eclipse, Docker to support end to end software development Experience with Relational databases, queries and RDBMS best practices as a consumer Strong troubleshooting and performance tuning skills Ability to work in a fast paced Agile development and rapid deployment in the Cloud/SaaS environment Able to effectively communicate across teams and roles BS/MS in Computer Science or a related field', 'Be part of an awesome R&D team where you get inspired by talented people, challenges and mission to change the global e-commerce landscape! \xa0 ', 'Strong knowledge of design patterns, OOPS principles and data structures ', 'Rakuten Catalog Platform is an exciting project at Rakuten. This platform supports global business units from many countries including USA,  Japan, UK, Germany, Canada and others. ', 'Able to effectively communicate across teams and roles ', 'Role:', 'At Rakuten, we offer competitive salaries, benefits, annual bonuses, a stocked kitchen (including catered lunch daily), and a dynamic office environment. As a technology focused company, we understand the importance of an energizing atmosphere that promotes collaboration and innovation. ', 'Job Description: ', 'This platform uses Big Data technologies, Cloud infrastructure, open source scalable search platform and cutting edge machine learning/statistical modeling and it will be highly leveraged within the company, becoming the foundation for our next-generation of applications. ', 'Strong troubleshooting and performance tuning skills ', 'Experience with any of these technologies a HUGE plus: Big Data (Cassandra / Hadoop), Spark, Flink, machine learning, Cloud (AWS or Google Cloud) ', 'Ability to work in a fast paced Agile development and rapid deployment in the Cloud/SaaS environment ', 'Rakuten, Inc. is the largest ecommerce company in Japan, and third largest ecommerce marketplace worldwide. We promote an open diverse environment, encourage contributions to open-source software and invest heavily in our staff. Our team is talented, capable and inclusive. 'Today, nearly every business in the world\xa0has to\xa0do bookkeeping and accounting in order to file taxes, understand financial health, and most importantly, make strategic business decisions. The process is universally manual, tedious, and error prone. At the same time, the process follows well-defined rules, abides by industry standardization, and has become increasingly\xa0data-rich. It’s a product-focused machine learning team’s dream. Sage Intacct Artificial Intelligence Labs “SAIL” is a nimble team within Sage Intacct building the future of cloud accounting by leveraging artificial intelligence. The SAIL team builds capabilities to help businesses make better decisions through data-powered insights. We are looking for a Principal Machine Learning Scientist in San Francisco to help us ship AI-powered products\xa0and services. As a part of our cross-functional team, including data scientists and engineers, you will help steer the direction of the entire company’s Artificial Intelligence / Machine Learning effort and you will also be a key individual contributor.\xa0']

['', 'Experience needed to apply', 'That will not be an issue for you here.\xa0\xa0This company is going to change the way we see data in a MAJOR way through solving a genuine business problem.', '3+ years in enterprise software sales closing large deals ($200k).', 'Playing a defining part in our journey to Unicorn status.', 'Selling a complex IT solution (e.g. Big Data, DB, DevOps).', 'What will the role consist of?', "Every week there seems to be a new Snowflake coming out of the blocks, but they rarely live up to the hype either due to lack of direction or a product that can't compete.", 'Closing deals on average of $250k at C-level.', '$300K-350K OTE + Stock + Most aggressive comp plan in the last DECADE', 'Regional Sales Manager- $70 Mil Series B - Big Data / Analytics', 'Becoming an SME on our product and evolving with it.', 'After leading their last company to one of the most renowned exits in software sales, producing one of the largest multipliers in history en route, this team of rockstar leaders have finally landed at their next soon to be Unicorn (you WILL know these guys). Trust me, they pick them well.', '3+ years in enterprise software sales closing large deals ($200k).Selling a complex IT solution (e.g. Big Data, DB, DevOps).Succesful track record of quota over-achievement (120%+).Practical application of methodical sales process (MEDDIC ideal).Experience building out a region / start-up experience (hustlers).', 'Hunting new business in the Washington and surrounding areas region.', 'Hunting new business in the Washington and surrounding areas region.Playing a defining part in our journey to Unicorn status.Evangelising our solution in the market.Closing deals on average of $250k at C-level.Becoming an SME on our product and evolving with it.', 'Succesful track record of quota over-achievement (120%+).', 'Evangelising our solution in the market.', 'Experience building out a region / start-up experience (hustlers).', 'If you put this off, you will miss the boat. Apply now.', 'Practical application of methodical sales process (MEDDIC ideal).', 'We are looking for a FIRST Senior RSM to build out the Washington & surrounding areas region from the ground up (with some great use cases already in the region). This is not for the faint-hearted so we are looking for tough individuals with serious drive to excel. This will take you to the next level, and make you a lot of money along the way.\xa0', '\xa0']

['', 'Here at Change Healthcare, we’re using our influence to drive positive changes across the industry, and we want motivated and passionate people like you to help us continue to bring new and innovative ideas to life.If you’re ready to embrace your passion and do what you love with a company that’s committed to supporting your future, then you belong at Change Healthcare.', 'Healthcare billing and/or clinical data experience highly desirable (but not necessary).', 'Ability to summarize complex insights in plain English (for eventual consumption by the business and/or customers).', 'Empower Your Future. Make a Difference.', 'Analyze healthcare trends. Understand drivers for health & wellness for both individuals and the health ecosystem at large. Use this understanding to help create predictive models projecting future healthcare conditions, outcomes and economics.', 'What other skills/experience would be helpful to have?', 'Healthcare billing and/or clinical data experience highly desirable (but not necessary).Ability to take initiative and work independentlyDemonstrates curiosity/determination/iteration/innovation in using data to improve healthcare.Experience matching/linking multiple datasets to create cohesive, longitudinal analytic datasets.Ability to interpret abstract concepts to developer compelling insight, while ensuring their statistical validity.Internal burning desire to succeed, yet a team player.', 'Ability to take initiative and work independently', 'Effective collaborator (within CHC and with customers). Success requires effective internal teamwork (IT, legal, account management, executives) and key external constituents.', ' Minimum 6 years of experience in Data Solutions Field or related area. ', 'Transforming the future of healthcare isn’t something we take lightly. It takes teams of the best and the brightest, working together to make an impact.', 'Analyze anonymized healthcare information to support Change Healthcare and our customers & partners objectives, which include better healthcare outcomes, improved effectiveness and efficiency, enhanced access for those who need care, and strengthened health and wellness for patients and consumers.Create input for thought leadership projects that shape and advance the responsible use of data to improve healthcare in the US.Analyze healthcare trends. Understand drivers for health & wellness for both individuals and the health ecosystem at large. Use this understanding to help create predictive models projecting future healthcare conditions, outcomes and economics.Effective collaborator (within CHC and with customers). Success requires effective internal teamwork (IT, legal, account management, executives) and key external constituents.', 'Experience matching/linking multiple datasets to create cohesive, longitudinal analytic datasets.', 'What are the working conditions and physical requirements of this job? ', 'EEO is the Law', 'Ability to interpret abstract concepts to developer compelling insight, while ensuring their statistical validity.', 'Overview Of Position', " Minimum 6 years of experience in Data Solutions Field or related area. Champion innovation. Earn trust. Be agile. Include all. ', 'Basic to intermediate understanding of statistics (predictions, statistical significance, normalization, etc.).', 'Demonstrates curiosity/determination/iteration/innovation in using data to improve healthcare.', 'Create input for thought leadership projects that shape and advance the responsible use of data to improve healthcare in the US.', 'Internal burning desire to succeed, yet a team player.', ' Equal Opportunity/Affirmative Action Statement ']

['', 'Founded in by a Google software engineer and a quant trader, we are backed by some great investors, including Y Combinator and a famous Venture Capital firm. ', 'About us', 'You’ll investigate data, construct a hypothesis, and think deeply about the results. \xa0After several iterations, you will discover something new. \xa0Instead of writing a paper, you will actually apply your ideas in the real world and see them working. You’ll need to care more about analysis being correct then achieving a p-value below 0.05. You’ll collaborate with a group of colleagues with a variety of backgrounds in a process of scientific inquiry. By honestly and openly reviewing others’ work, and having your work reviewed by them, you’ll be a guardian of the research process at our firm. We’re using ideas across multiple disciplines: computer science, machine learning, statistics and biostatistics including survival analysis, supervised learning, natural language processing, imbalanced data, feature extraction and selection, and many, many other areas. ', 'About us ', 'Knowledge of finance is cool – but in no way a requirement.', 'You must be comfortable and enjoy working with data. \xa0This is the lifeblood of our business, your hypotheses start there and your testing ends there. ', 'You must be comfortable writing code. \xa0Nobody will be doing it for you. \xa0The better you are at it, the more efficiently you can explore the model space and find winning ideas. ', ' ', 'What you bring to the table ', 'An innovative investment fund with over $800 million assets under management, we combine quantitative research, software engineering and rigorous scientific investigation to build credit portfolios that produce strong and consistent yields across business cycles. \xa0 ', 'Company events are inclusive and fun, with expeditions to food trucks and Michelin-starred local restaurants, and annual trips to Montana and Stinson Beach featuring hiking and cooking ', 'We are profitable, managing over $800M, including investment from non-profits and university endowments ', 'What you bring to the table', 'We’re using ideas across multiple disciplines: computer science, machine learning, statistics and biostatistics including survival analysis, supervised learning, natural language processing, imbalanced data, feature extraction and selection, and many, many other areas. ', 'We are a small, passionate, and collaborative team -- fewer than 30 research, engineering and finance and operations professionals with a diversity of backgrounds and ideas ', "Every member of the team has a major impact on the company's success with visible contributions to the business ", 'You should be a good scientist. \xa0You need to know when you have something and when you don’t, you cannot be fooled by randomness. ', 'What you’ll do ', 'We offer competitive salary and opportunity for equity ownership, generous benefits, and an inclusive and collaborative work environment ', 'We seek talented individuals who are thoughtful, innovative, tenacious and interested in a mission-focused team environment ', 'We are located in SoMa in San Francisco, a vigorous 12-minute walk from BART and CalTrain ', 'Research background devising novel approaches to solving problems and applying them to real world data to achieve robust, repeatable results. ', "Founded in by a Google software engineer and a quant trader, we are backed by some great investors, including Y Combinator and a famous Venture Capital firm. We are profitable, managing over $800M, including investment from non-profits and university endowments We are a small, passionate, and collaborative team -- fewer than 30 research, engineering and finance and operations professionals with a diversity of backgrounds and ideas Every member of the team has a major impact on the company's success with visible contributions to the business We deeply value intellectual curiosity, creative idea generation, and close collaboration We seek talented individuals who are thoughtful, innovative, tenacious and interested in a mission-focused team environment We share ideas informally at team lunches, academic paper discussions, and through our bi-weekly All-Hands meetings Company events are inclusive and fun, with expeditions to food trucks and Michelin-starred local restaurants, and annual trips to Montana and Stinson Beach featuring hiking and cooking We are located in SoMa in San Francisco, a vigorous 12-minute walk from BART and CalTrain We offer competitive salary and opportunity for equity ownership, generous benefits, and an inclusive and collaborative work environment ", 'You’ll need to care more about analysis being correct then achieving a p-value below 0.05. ', 'A high level of mathematical and statistical literacy, and an intense interest in applying quantitative analysis to do first class research. ', 'You’ll investigate data, construct a hypothesis, and think deeply about the results. \xa0After several iterations, you will discover something new. \xa0Instead of writing a paper, you will actually apply your ideas in the real world and see them working. ', 'We share ideas informally at team lunches, academic paper discussions, and through our bi-weekly All-Hands meetings ', 'By honestly and openly reviewing others’ work, and having your work reviewed by them, you’ll be a guardian of the research process at our firm. ', 'You’ll collaborate with a group of colleagues with a variety of backgrounds in a process of scientific inquiry. ', 'You should be creative. \xa0You will be coming up with original hypotheses to expand and refine our understanding of the world, and a framework to validate them. ', 'Quantitative Researcher', 'A high level of mathematical and statistical literacy, and an intense interest in applying quantitative analysis to do first class research. You should be a good scientist. \xa0You need to know when you have something and when you don’t, you cannot be fooled by randomness. You must be comfortable and enjoy working with data. \xa0This is the lifeblood of our business, your hypotheses start there and your testing ends there. You should be creative. \xa0You will be coming up with original hypotheses to expand and refine our understanding of the world, and a framework to validate them. You must be comfortable writing code. \xa0Nobody will be doing it for you. \xa0The better you are at it, the more efficiently you can explore the model space and find winning ideas. Research background devising novel approaches to solving problems and applying them to real world data to achieve robust, repeatable results. Knowledge of finance is cool – but in no way a requirement.', 'San Francisco, CA ', 'What you’ll do', 'We deeply value intellectual curiosity, creative idea generation, and close collaboration ', 'Quantitative Researcher ']

Available in more than 200 markets around the world, the PayPal platform, including Braintree, Venmo and Xoom, enables consumers and merchants to receive money in more than 100 currencies, withdraw funds in 56 currencies and hold balances in their PayPal accounts in 25 currencies. ', ' Work directly with Lead engineer, Architecture, Product Managers, Program Managers and stakeholders ', ' Work directly with Product Managers, Program Managers, Data Scientists/Customers ', ' Knowledge and experience with cloud technologies ', 'Who We Are']

['', 'Here at Change Healthcare, we’re using our influence to drive positive changes across the industry, and we want motivated and passionate people like you to help us continue to bring new and innovative ideas to life.If you’re ready to embrace your passion and do what you love with a company that’s committed to supporting your future, then you belong at Change Healthcare.', 'Healthcare billing and/or clinical data experience highly desirable (but not necessary).', 'Ability to summarize complex insights in plain English (for eventual consumption by the business and/or customers).', 'Empower Your Future. Make a Difference.', 'Analyze healthcare trends. Understand drivers for health & wellness for both individuals and the health ecosystem at large. Use this understanding to help create predictive models projecting future healthcare conditions, outcomes and economics.', 'What other skills/experience would be helpful to have?', 'Healthcare billing and/or clinical data experience highly desirable (but not necessary).Ability to take initiative and work independentlyDemonstrates curiosity/determination/iteration/innovation in using data to improve healthcare.Experience matching/linking multiple datasets to create cohesive, longitudinal analytic datasets.Ability to interpret abstract concepts to developer compelling insight, while ensuring their statistical validity.Internal burning desire to succeed, yet a team player.', 'Ability to take initiative and work independently', 'Effective collaborator (within CHC and with customers). Success requires effective internal teamwork (IT, legal, account management, executives) and key external constituents.', ' Minimum 6 years of experience in Data Solutions Field or related area. ', 'Transforming the future of healthcare isn’t something we take lightly. It takes teams of the best and the brightest, working together to make an impact.', 'Analyze anonymized healthcare information to support Change Healthcare and our customers & partners objectives, which include better healthcare outcomes, improved effectiveness and efficiency, enhanced access for those who need care, and strengthened health and wellness for patients and consumers.Create input for thought leadership projects that shape and advance the responsible use of data to improve healthcare in the US.Analyze healthcare trends. Understand drivers for health & wellness for both individuals and the health ecosystem at large. Use this understanding to help create predictive models projecting future healthcare conditions, outcomes and economics.Effective collaborator (within CHC and with customers). Success requires effective internal teamwork (IT, legal, account management, executives) and key external constituents.', 'Experience matching/linking multiple datasets to create cohesive, longitudinal analytic datasets.', 'What are the working conditions and physical requirements of this job? ', 'EEO is the Law', 'Ability to interpret abstract concepts to developer compelling insight, while ensuring their statistical validity.', 'Overview Of Position', " Minimum 6 years of experience in Data Solutions Field or related area. Bachelor's degree required (ideally with strong concentration in statistics or programming.Advanced SQL expertise with at least 1-2 years’ experience working with large datasets (30 million records +).Expertise extracting large datasets and presenting in Excel or Spotfire.Basic to intermediate understanding of statistics (predictions, statistical significance, normalization, etc.).Ability to summarize complex insights in plain English (for eventual consumption by the business and/or customers).", 'What are the requirements needed for this position?', "Bachelor's degree required (ideally with strong concentration in statistics or programming.", 'What will be my duties and responsibilities in this job?', 'As one of the largest healthcare technology companies in the U.S., we are a catalyst to accelerate the journey toward improved lives and healthier communities.', 'Analyze anonymized healthcare information to support Change Healthcare and our customers & partners objectives, which include better healthcare outcomes, improved effectiveness and efficiency, enhanced access for those who need care, and strengthened health and wellness for patients and consumers.', 'Expertise extracting large datasets and presenting in Excel or Spotfire.', 'Advanced SQL expertise with at least 1-2 years’ experience working with large datasets (30 million records +).', 'Pursue purpose. Champion innovation. Earn trust. Be agile. Include all. ', 'Basic to intermediate understanding of statistics (predictions, statistical significance, normalization, etc.).', 'Demonstrates curiosity/determination/iteration/innovation in using data to improve healthcare.', 'Create input for thought leadership projects that shape and advance the responsible use of data to improve healthcare in the US.', 'Internal burning desire to succeed, yet a team player.', ' Equal Opportunity/Affirmative Action Statement ']

['', 'Here at Change Healthcare, we’re using our influence to drive positive changes across the industry, and we want motivated and passionate people like you to help us continue to bring new and innovative ideas to life.If you’re ready to embrace your passion and do what you love with a company that’s committed to supporting your future, then you belong at Change Healthcare.', 'Healthcare billing and/or clinical data experience highly desirable (but not necessary).', 'Ability to summarize complex insights in plain English (for eventual consumption by the business and/or customers).', 'Empower Your Future. Make a Difference.', 'Analyze healthcare trends. Understand drivers for health & wellness for both individuals and the health ecosystem at large. Use this understanding to help create predictive models projecting future healthcare conditions, outcomes and economics.', 'What other skills/experience would be helpful to have?', 'Healthcare billing and/or clinical data experience highly desirable (but not necessary).Ability to take initiative and work independentlyDemonstrates curiosity/determination/iteration/innovation in using data to improve healthcare.Experience matching/linking multiple datasets to create cohesive, longitudinal analytic datasets.Ability to interpret abstract concepts to developer compelling insight, while ensuring their statistical validity.Internal burning desire to succeed, yet a team player.', 'Ability to take initiative and work independently', 'Effective collaborator (within CHC and with customers). Success requires effective internal teamwork (IT, legal, account management, executives) and key external constituents.', ' Minimum 6 years of experience in Data Solutions Field or related area. ', 'Transforming the future of healthcare isn’t something we take lightly. It takes teams of the best and the brightest, working together to make an impact.', 'Analyze anonymized healthcare information to support Change Healthcare and our customers & partners objectives, which include better healthcare outcomes, improved effectiveness and efficiency, enhanced access for those who need care, and strengthened health and wellness for patients and consumers.Create input for thought leadership projects that shape and advance the responsible use of data to improve healthcare in the US.Analyze healthcare trends. Understand drivers for health & wellness for both individuals and the health ecosystem at large. Use this understanding to help create predictive models projecting future healthcare conditions, outcomes and economics.Effective collaborator (within CHC and with customers). Success requires effective internal teamwork (IT, legal, account management, executives) and key external constituents.', 'Experience matching/linking multiple datasets to create cohesive, longitudinal analytic datasets.', 'What are the working conditions and physical requirements of this job? ', 'EEO is the Law', 'Ability to interpret abstract concepts to developer compelling insight, while ensuring their statistical validity.', 'Overview Of Position', " Minimum 6 years of experience in Data Solutions Field or related area. Bachelor's degree required (ideally with strong concentration in statistics or programming.Advanced SQL expertise with at least 1-2 years’ experience working with large datasets (30 million records +).Expertise extracting large datasets and presenting in Excel or Spotfire.Basic to intermediate understanding of statistics (predictions, statistical significance, normalization, etc.).Ability to summarize complex insights in plain English (for eventual consumption by the business and/or customers).", 'What are the requirements needed for this position?', "Bachelor's degree required (ideally with strong concentration in statistics or programming.", 'What will be my duties and responsibilities in this job?', 'As one of the largest healthcare technology companies in the U.S., we are a catalyst to accelerate the journey toward improved lives and healthier communities.', 'Analyze anonymized healthcare information to support Change Healthcare and our customers & partners objectives, which include better healthcare outcomes, improved effectiveness and efficiency, enhanced access for those who need care, and strengthened health and wellness for patients and consumers.', 'Expertise extracting large datasets and presenting in Excel or Spotfire.', 'Advanced SQL expertise with at least 1-2 years’ experience working with large datasets (30 million records +).', 'Pursue purpose. Champion innovation. Earn trust. Be agile. Include all. ', 'Basic to intermediate understanding of statistics (predictions, statistical significance, normalization, etc.).', 'Demonstrates curiosity/determination/iteration/innovation in using data to improve healthcare.', 'Create input for thought leadership projects that shape and advance the responsible use of data to improve healthcare in the US.', 'Internal burning desire to succeed, yet a team player.', ' Equal Opportunity/Affirmative Action Statement ']

Understand drivers for health & wellness for both individuals and the health ecosystem at large. Use this understanding to help create predictive models projecting future healthcare conditions, outcomes and economics.Effective collaborator (within CHC and with customers). Success requires effective internal teamwork (IT, legal, account management, executives) and key external constituents.', 'Experience matching/linking multiple datasets to create cohesive, longitudinal analytic datasets.', 'What are the working conditions and physical requirements of this job? ', 'EEO is the Law', 'Ability to interpret abstract concepts to developer compelling insight, while ensuring their statistical validity.', 'Overview Of Position', " Minimum 6 years of experience in Data Solutions Field or related area. Bachelor's degree required (ideally with strong concentration in statistics or programming.Advanced SQL expertise with at least 1-2 years’ experience working with large datasets (30 million records +).Expertise extracting large datasets and presenting in Excel or Spotfire.Basic to intermediate understanding of statistics (predictions, statistical significance, normalization, etc.).Ability to summarize complex insights in plain English (for eventual consumption by the business and/or customers).", 'What are the requirements needed for this position?', "Bachelor's degree required (ideally with strong concentration in statistics or programming.", 'What will be my duties and responsibilities in this job?', 'As one of the largest healthcare technology companies in the U.S., we are a catalyst to accelerate the journey toward improved lives and healthier communities.', 'Analyze anonymized healthcare information to support Change Healthcare and our customers & partners objectives, which include better healthcare outcomes, improved effectiveness and efficiency, enhanced access for those who need care, and strengthened health and wellness for patients and consumers.', 'Expertise extracting large datasets and presenting in Excel or Spotfire.', 'Advanced SQL expertise with at least 1-2 years’ experience working with large datasets (30 million records +).', 'Pursue purpose. Champion innovation. Earn trust. Be agile. Include all. ', 'Basic to intermediate understanding of statistics (predictions, statistical significance, normalization, etc.).', 'Demonstrates curiosity/determination/iteration/innovation in using data to improve healthcare.', 'Create input for thought leadership projects that shape and advance the responsible use of data to improve healthcare in the US.', 'Internal burning desire to succeed, yet a team player.', ' Equal Opportunity/Affirmative Action Statement ']

Our open digital payments platform gives PayPal’s 305 million active account holders the confidence to connect and transact in new and powerful ways, whether they are online, on a mobile device, in an app, or in person. Through a combination of technological innovation and strategic partnerships, PayPal creates better ways to manage and move money, and offers choice and flexibility when sending payments, paying or getting paid. Available in more than 200 markets around the world, the PayPal platform, including Braintree, Venmo and Xoom, enables consumers and merchants to receive money in more than 100 currencies, withdraw funds in 56 currencies and hold balances in their PayPal accounts in 25 currencies. ', ' Work directly with Lead engineer, Architecture, Product Managers, Program Managers and stakeholders ', ' Work directly with Product Managers, Program Managers, Data Scientists/Customers ', ' Knowledge and experience with cloud technologies ', 'Who We Are']
